title: Elisa Longo Borghini Out of Tour de France Femmes After Training Crash
content:
Giro d'Italia winner 'can't ride her bike'; Lotte Kopecky also absent from start line in Rotterdam with Moolman-Pasio set to miss out.

Read the full article at Elisa Longo Borghini Out of Tour de France Femmes After Training Crash on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
